item.title: Wildfire Smoke Will Kill Thousands More by 2050, Study Finds

item.title: Trump Asks Supreme Court to Allow Removal of Fed Governor
item.description: President Trump had pressed to fire Lisa Cook before the central bank’s meeting, at which the board voted to raise interest rates.

item.title: I’ve Written About Loads of Scams. This Phone Scam Almost Got Me.
